R0034.title: Automated Account Seasoning
R0034.definition: Using automated means to improve account credibility.
R0034.description: Using automated activities on stolen accounts or bulk-registered accounts to reduce account risk scores or improve account credibility â€” for example, automated reviews, comments, posts, and transactions.
R0034.influence: Automated account seasoning typically needs to be combined with other business risk scenarios to monetize, such as benefit abuse, flash sale grabbing, and metric manipulation.

references.title: RPA Robot Automated Account Seasoning and AdsPower Anti-Fingerprint Browser
